summary: Dragonborn dlc is required for this mod to work. untile recently morrowind was not in skyrim, therfore the little gateway at the morrowind border was not accessible and was only there for looks as best as everyone can tell, but now you can get to Solstheim from the gate to morrowind located past stendars beacon.
descriptionHtml:
Dragonborn dlc is required for this mod to work. untile recently morrowind was not in skyrim, therfore the little gateway at the morrowind border was not accessible and was only there for looks as best as everyone can tell, but now you can get to Solstheim from the gate to morrowind located past stendars beacon. i thought it would be nice to access morrowind in a more immersive way than just taking a boat to get there. once you cross the border you will find a bridge to get you across the ocean into Solstheim from morrowind.

Requires Dragonborn.esm

also add this line into you\'re skyrim ini file located in you\'re my documents folder c:/User/Yourename/mydocuments/skyrim

in Skyrim.ini Under General add this line bBorderRegionsEnabled=0 in order to use this mod this line is required to be added.



I have also just added a Compadibility Version of this mod for use with More immersive dawnguard Entrances.
author: TheClawOfAVultcher Team Raven

files.name: Skyrim To Morrowind compadibilty with more immersive dawnguard entrance
